title: IRefPlane.IGetBoundingBox
description: Gets the bounding box of the reference plane, the top-left and bottom-right points.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array containing the bounding box, always two (2) IMathpoint objects VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
